about.title: About
about.description1: My name is Jefferson Santos and I am a technology enthusiast who decided to pursue a career in programming. Over the last four years, I have dedicated myself to understanding the main technologies on the market and applying agile development methodologies (I’m a coffee lover).
about.description2: I completed a technical course in Systems Development (DS) with a focus on Full Stack development. Since then, I have worked on projects as a freelancer and contributed to open source projects, continually improving my skills and experience in the field.
